location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Benjamin Jervis, East India Company Resident at Bushere [Bushire], to Peter Elwin Wrench, East India Company Agent at Bussora [Basra]

mods.abstract: The letter relays the news that Carem Caun [Karim Khan] has written and is expected to reach Bunderick [Bandar Rig] by the end of the month. A request is made for the Tartarto assist the Khan in his attack against Meer Mahanna [MÄ«r Muhanna]. Also discussed is the repair and sale of a trankey, and the tin and woollens trade.
